data.text: “Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli, ekitiibwa kya Yakobo kirikendeera;
Ku lunaku luli abantu balirowooza ku Mutonzi waabwe,
So tebalirowooza ku byoto bya balubaale baabwe,
Mu biro ebyo ebibuga byabwe eby’amaanyi Abayisirayiri bye baabalesa, biriba ng’ebifo ebyameramu ebisaka ne kalandalugo. Byonna birisigala matongo.
Wadde obisimba bulungi nnyo ne bimera ku lunaku lw’obisimbye,
Wadde amawanga galiwuuma n’okuwulikika ne gawulikika ng’amazzi agayiika n’amaanyi amangi,
